LDS LDStorymakers Conference
Welcome to Storymakers 2016! Click on the second tab to view your schedule. Select the + button to add a class to your schedule! Add your first class AddScheduleActivity PresentationActivity Upcoming Schedule Add Class Feedback Click here to give conference feedback Click here to give course feedback Synch schedule My Schedule Swipe right to view full schedule View Bio ADD CLASS Feedback Notifications BioActivity Feedback Map HelpActivity
Tips To remove an item from your schedule press and hold the item, and then select \'REMOVE\' when prompted The \'Upcoming Schedule\' section tells you what events are coming up next. This both includes presentations and other events like registration The \'Next Class\' section tells you which presentation is coming up next in your schedule Tap on an item in your schedule to get more information about that item.
